About Us

OUR GOAL: To be able to help the patients get the primary first-aid treatment while still being able to maintain the quality of the service.Our aim is to ease the process of doctor appointment booking and to maintain records of the patients as well as the doctors. It also provides a user friendly environment where the users could choose instant chat or late appointment. Under late appointment, they can choose the date and time as per their convenience

We will continue to grow to make the website more user friendly and interactive.

Meet The Team


We are a team of students from Vit-Chennai.
